typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		company_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		zip as string,
		phone1 as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcCSV
source(output(
		Country as string,
		State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srczipcode
srcCSV, srczipcode lookup(srcCSV@state == srczipcode@State,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sort(asc(srcCSV@state, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> sortthroughstate
sortthroughstate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkDestination
